statements: SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transportation_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, schedule_time FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE schedule_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT route_name, start_location FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE end_location = 'Station A';
SELECT end_location, start_location FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE route_name LIKE '%Express%';
SELECT * FROM public_transportation_routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE schedule_time > '12:00';
SELECT DISTINCT route_name, CONCAT(start_location, ' - ', end_location) AS journey_details FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE start_location <> end_location;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location, schedule_time FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE schedule_time IS NOT NULL ORDER BY route_id ASC;
SELECT route_name, end_location, start_location, schedule_time FROM public_transportation_routes WHERE route_name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, start_station, end_station FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_station, end_station FROM routes ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE route_id = 2;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_station, end_station FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE start_station = 'New York' AND end_station = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT route_id, route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM routes JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id WHERE departure_time > '08:00:00' AND arrival_time < '15:00:00';
SELECT route_name, end_station, COUNT(schedule_id) AS total_schedules FROM routes JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id GROUP BY route_name, end_station HAVING total_schedules > 5;
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC, start_station ASC;
SELECT * FROM route ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_station, end_station FROM route WHERE start_station = 'City A';
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time FROM schedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT station_name, location_coords FROM station ORDER BY station_id ASC;
SELECT route_name, start_station, end_station FROM route WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM route ORDER BY route_name;
SELECT route_name, start_station, end_station FROM route WHERE start_station = 'Station A';
SELECT route_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM route r JOIN schedule s ON r.route_id = s.route_id WHERE s.day_of_week = 'Monday';
SELECT route_name, start_station, end_station FROM route WHERE start_station = 'Station A' OR end_station = 'Station B';

SELECT r.route_name, s.departure_time, s.arrival_time, st.station_name FROM route r JOIN schedule s ON r.route_id = s.route_id JOIN station st ON r.start_station = st.station_name ORDER BY s.departure_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM public_transport_routes WHERE start_location = 'City A';
SELECT * FROM transit_schedule ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT stop_name, location_lat, location_lng FROM transit_stops WHERE stop_id = 3;
SELECT vehicle_name, capacity FROM vehicle_types WHERE average_speed > 50;
SELECT * FROM public_transport_routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM public_transport_routes WHERE start_location = 'City A' ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM transit_schedule WHERE arrival_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT stop_name, location_lat, location_lng FROM transit_stops WHERE location_lat BETWEEN 20.0 AND 30.0 ORDER BY location_lat ASC;
SELECT vehicle_name, capacity, average_speed FROM vehicle_types WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY average_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM routes ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT stop_name, stop_location FROM stops WHERE stop_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE route_id = 3 AND stop_id = 5;
SELECT vehicle_name FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, route_id FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT s.schedule_id, r.route_name, s.departure_time, s.arrival_time, v.vehicle_name FROM schedules s JOIN routes r ON s.route_id = r.route_id JOIN vehicles v ON s.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id;
SELECT s.schedule_id, r.route_name, v.vehicle_name FROM schedules s JOIN routes r ON s.route_id = r.route_id JOIN vehicles v ON s.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id WHERE r.route_name = 'Route A';
